net.posprinter.utils

类 DataForSendToPrinterTSC

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.posprinter.utils.DataForSendToPrinterTSC

  • public class DataForSendToPrinterTSC
extends java.lang.Object
    作者:
    chensong
    本类为指令处理工具类。该类处理的指令只适用于条码打印机系列的产品； 具体指令的描述和效果请参考编程手册TSC条码打印机指令TSPL手册.pdf

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      DataForSendToPrinterTSC()

      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static byte[] autoDetect(int x, int y)
      This command feeds the paper through the gap/black mark sensor in an effort to determine the paper and gap/black mark sizes, respectively.
      static byte[] backFeed(int n)
      This command feeds the label in reverse.
      static byte[] bar(int x, int y, int width, int heigth)
      在嘶`上
      This command draws a bar on the label format.

      指令用懋一Sl，共 23 N
      详细注解请查看编程手册
      This command prints 1D barcodes.

      This command draws bitmap images (as opposed to BMP graphic files).

      This command obtains the printer status at any time, even in the event of printer error.

      This command activates the cutter to immediately cut the labels without back feeding the label.

      static byte[] home()
      一般_C後打印第一嘶`r，打印位置都不蚀_，打印第二嘶`r打印位置就正_，若要_C後第一嘶`就要打印在正_的位置，可使用指令
      This command will feed label until the internal sensor has determined the origin.

      • setCharsetName

        public static void setCharsetName(java.lang.String charset)
        设置将打印内容传输给打印机所采用的字符编码，默认为中文编码“gbk”
        参数:
        charset - 字符编码类型（打印机所能识别的字符编码类型，具体请参考编程手册代码页设置）

              double n)

        SIZE m mm,n mm
        参数:
        m - ,Label width (inch/ mm/ dot)
        n - ,Label length (inch/ mm/ dot)
        返回:
        byte[]

      • gapByinch

        public static byte[] gapByinch(double m,
               double n)
        该指令定义两张标签纸间的垂直间距距离 Defines the gap distance between two labels.
        GAP m,n
        参数:
        m,The - gap distance between two labels
        0 ≤ m ≤1 (inch), 0 ≤ m ≤ 25.4 (mm)
        0 ≤ m ≤5 (inch), 0 ≤ m ≤ 127 (mm) / since V6.21 EZ and later firmware
        n,The - offset distance of the gap
        n ≤ label length (inch or mm)
        返回:
        byte[]

        0 ≤ m ≤5 (inch), 0 ≤ m ≤ 127 (mm) / since V6.21 EZ and later firmware
        n,The - offset distance of the gap
        n ≤ label length (inch or mm)

      • gapBydot

        public static byte[] gapBydot(int m,
              int n)
        该指令定义两张标签纸间的垂直间距距离 Defines the gap distance between two labels.
        GAP m,n
        参数:
        m - The gap distance between two labels,0 ≤ m ≤1 (inch), 0 ≤ m ≤ 25.4 (mm)
        0 ≤ m ≤5 (inch), 0 ≤ m ≤ 127 (mm) / since V6.21 EZ and later firmware
        n - The offset distance of the gap
        n ≤ label length (inch or mm)
        返回:
        byte[]

      • gapDetect

        public static byte[] gapDetect(int x,
               int y)
        This command feeds the paper through the gap sensor in an effort to determine the paper and gap sizes, respectively. This command references the user’s approximate measurements. If the measurements conflict with the actual size, the GAPDETECT command will not work properly. This calibration method can be applied to the labels with pre-printed logos or texts.
        参数:
        x - Paper length (in dots)
        y - Gap length (in dots)
        返回:
        byte[]

      • gapDetect

        public static byte[] gapDetect()
        This command feeds the paper through the gap sensor in an effort to determine the paper and gap sizes, respectively. This command references the user’s approximate measurements. If the measurements conflict with the actual size, the GAPDETECT command will not work properly. This calibration method can be applied to the labels with pre-printed logos or texts.
        参数:
        X - Paper length (in dots)
        Y - Gap length (in dots)
        返回:
        byte[]

      • blineDetect

        public static byte[] blineDetect(int x,
                 int y)
        This command feeds the paper through the black mark sensor in an effort to determine the paper and black mark sizes, respectively. This command references the user’s approximate measurements. If the measurements conflict with the actual size, the BLINEDETECT command will not work properly. This calibration method can be applied to the labels with pre-printed logos or texts.
        参数:
        X - Paper length (in dots)
        Y - Gap length (in dots)
        返回:
        byte[]

      • autoDetect

        public static byte[] autoDetect(int x,
                int y)
        This command feeds the paper through the gap/black mark sensor in an effort to determine the paper and gap/black mark sizes, respectively. This command references the user’s approximate measurements. If the measurements conflict with the actual size, the AUTODETECT command will not work properly. This calibration method can be applied to the labels with pre-printed logos or texts.
        参数:
        X - Paper length (in dots)
        Y - Gap length (in dots)
        返回:
        byte[]

      • blineByinch

        public static byte[] blineByinch(double m,
                 double n)
        该指令用于设定黑标的高度及偏移位置 This command sets the height of the black line and the user-defined extra label feeding length each form feed takes.
        BLINE m,n
        参数:
        m - The height of black line either in inch or mm
        0 ≤ m ≤ 1 (inch), 0 ≤ m ≤ 25.4 (mm) 0 ≤ m ≤5 (inch), 0 ≤ m ≤ 127 (mm) / since V6.21 EZ and later firmware
        n - The extra label feeding length
        0 ≤ n ≤ label length
        返回:
        byte[]

      • blineBymm

        该指令用于设定黑标的高度及偏移位置 This command sets the height of the black line and the user-defined extra label feeding length each form feed takes.
        BLINE m dot,n dot
        参数:
        m - The height of black line either in inch or mm
        0 ≤ m ≤ 1 (inch), 0 ≤ m ≤ 25.4 (mm)
        0 ≤ m ≤5 (inch), 0 ≤ m ≤ 127 (mm) / since V6.21 EZ and later firmware
        n - The extra label feeding length
        0 ≤ n ≤ label length
        返回:
        byte[]

      • density

        public static byte[] density(int n)
        This command sets the printing darkness
        DENSITY n
        参数:
        n - 0~15
        0: specifies the lightest level
        15: specifies the darkest level
        返回:
        byte[]

      • direction

        public static byte[] direction(int n)
        指令用於定x打印r出的方向
        This command defines the printout direction and mirror image. This will be stored in the printermemory.
        DIRECTION n[,m]
        参数:
        n - 0 or 1. Please refer to the illustrations below
        返回:
        byte[]

      • reference

        public static byte[] reference(int x,
               int y)
        指令用於定x嘶`的⒖甲嗽c
        This command defines the reference point of the label. The reference (origin) point varies with the print direction, as shown:
        REFERENCE x, y
        参数:
        x - Horizontal coordinate (in dots)
        y - Vertical coordinate (in dots)
        返回:
        byte[]

      • shift

        public static byte[] shift(int n)
        This command moves the label’s vertical position. A positive value moves the label further from the printing direction; a negative value moves the label towards the printing direction. For a visual representation, see next page.
        SHIFT n
        参数:
        n - The maximum value is 1 inch. For 200 dpi printers, the range is C203 to 203; for 300 dpi printers, the range is C300 to 300. The unit is dot.
        返回:
        byte[]

      • country

        public static byte[] country(java.lang.String n)
        指令用於O定可y式IP(x配，KP-200)LCD 因　的不同而@示所需的字元
        This command orients the keyboard for use in different countries via defining special characters on the KP-200 series portable LCD keyboard (option).
        COUNTRY n
        参数:
        n - 001: USA
        002: Canadian-French
        003: Spanish (Latin America)
        031: Dutch
        032: Belgian
        033: French (France)
        034: Spanish (Spain)
        036: Hungarian
        038: Yugoslavian
        039: Italian
        041: Switzerland
        042: Slovak
        044: United Kingdom
        045: Danish
        046: Swedish
        047: Norwegian
        048: Polish
        049: German
        055: Brazil
        061: English (International)
        351: Portuguese
        358: Finnish
        返回:
        byte[]

        CODEPAGE n
        参数:

      • feed

        public static byte[] feed(int n)
        指令用於控制M的距x，以c(dot)表示
        This command feeds label with the specified length. The length is specified by dot
        FEED n
        参数:
        n - unit: dot
        1 ≤ n ≤ 9999
        返回:
        byte[]

      • backFeed

        public static byte[] backFeed(int n)
        This command feeds the label in reverse. The length is specified by dot
        BACKFEED n
        参数:
        n - unit: dot,1 ≤ n ≤ 9999
        返回:
        byte[]

      • formFeed

        public static byte[] formFeed()
        指令可命令打印CM一
        This command feeds label to the beginning of next label
        返回:
        byte[]

      • home

        public static byte[] home()
        一般_C後打印第一嘶`r，打印位置都不蚀_，打印第二嘶`r打印位置就正_，若要_C後第一嘶`就要打印在正_的位置，可使用指令
        This command will feed label until the internal sensor has determined the origin. Size and gap of the label should be defined before using this command.
        HOME
        返回:
        byte[]

      • print

           int n)

        PRINT m [,n]
        参数:
        m - Specifies how many sets of labels will be printed.1 ≤ m ≤ 999999999
        n - Specifies how many copies should be printed for each particular label set.1 ≤ n ≤ 999999999
        返回:
        byte[]

        level - Sound level: 0~9
        interval - Sound interval: 1~4095

        At this command, the printer will print out the printer information
        SELFTEST [page]
        返回:
        byte[]

      • selfTest

        public static byte[] selfTest(java.lang.String page)
        At this command, the printer will print out the printer information
        SELFTEST [page]
        参数:
        page - omitted: Print a self-test page with whole printer information.
        PATTERN: Print a pattern to check the status of print head heat line.
        ETHERNET: Print a self-test page with Ethernet settings.
        WLAN: Print a self-test page with Wi-Fi settings.
        RS232: Print a self-test page with RS-232 settings.
        SYSTEM: Print a self-test page with printer settings.
        Z: Print a self-test page with emulated language settings.
        返回:
        byte[]

      • eoj

        public static byte[] eoj()
        Let the printer wait until process of commands (before EOJ) be finished then go on the next command.
        EOJ
        This command has been supported since V6.39 EZ and later firmware.
        返回:
        byte[]

        DELAY ms
        参数:
        ms - The specific period of time. Unit is millisecond. 1000 ms = 1 second
        返回:
        byte[]

        0: OVERWRITE
        1: OR
        2: XOR

        bmpType - 图片处理类型

                    int y,

                    int row_height,
                    int module_width,
                    java.lang.String content)
        This command draws CODABLOCK F mode barcode.
        CODABLOCK x,y,rotation,[row height,]module width,]”content”
        参数:
        x - Specify the x-coordinate
        y - Specify the y-coordinate
        rotation - 0 : No rotation
        90 : Rotate 90 degrees clockwise
        180 : Rotate 180 degrees clockwise
        270 : Rotate 270 degrees clockwise
        row_height - The height of individual row equals to row height x module width (Default is 8)
        module_width - Width of narrow element of CODABLOCK in dots (Default is 2)
        content - content of CODABLOCK bar code
        返回:
        byte[]

        public static byte[] pdf417(int x,

            int width,
            int height,
            int rotate,
            java.lang.String option,
            java.lang.String content)
        指令用泶蛴 PDF417 二Sla
        This command defines a PDF417 2D bar code.
        PDF417 x,y,width,height,rotate,[option],”content”
        参数:
        x - X-coordinate of starting point (in dot)
        y - Y-coordinate of starting point (in dot)
        width - Expected width (in dots)
        height - Expected height (in dots)

        0 : No rotation
        90 : Rotate 90 degrees
        180 : Rotate 180 degrees
        270 : Rotate 270 degrees
        option - 参数请查看编程手册，设置多个以，隔开，例如"E4,W4,T1";
        content - Content of PDF417 2D bar code
        返回:
        byte[]

      • putBmp

        public static byte[] putBmp(int x,
            int y,
            java.lang.String filename,
            int bpp,
            int contrast)
        This command prints BMP format images. The grayscale printing is for direct thermal mode only.
        Support 1-bit (monochrome) and 8-bit (256-color) BMP graphic only.
        PUTBMP x,y,”filename”[, bpp][, contract]
        参数:
        x - The x-coordinate of the BMP format image
        y - The y-coordinate of the BMP format image
        filename - The downloaded BMP filename
        bpp - Optional. Bits per pixel of grayscale graphic. Default is 1. *Since V6.91EZ.
        1: 1-bit (monochrome) graphic
        8: 8-bit (256-color) graphic
        contrast - Optional. Contrast of grayscale graphic. Default is 80. Suggested range is
        from 60 to 100. *Since V6.91EZ.
        返回:
        byte[]

      • putBmp

        public static byte[] putBmp(int x,
            int y,
            java.lang.String filename)

        from 60 to 100. *Since V6.91EZ.

        mode - Auto / manual encode
        A : Auto
        M : Manual
        rotation - 0 :
        0 degree
        90 : 90 degree
        180 : 180 degree
        270 : 270 degree
        model - M1: (default), original version
        M2: enhanced version (Almost smart phone is supported by this version.)
        mask - S0~S8, default is S7
        content - The encodable character set is described as below,

      • text

        public static byte[] text(int x,
          int y,
          java.lang.String font,
          int rotation,
          int x_multiplication,
          int y_multiplication,
          java.lang.String content)
        This command prints text on label.
        使用打印C　置文字(英)打印文字
        TEXT x,y,”font”,rotation,x-multiplication,y-multiplication,”content”
        参数:
        x - The x-coordinate of the text
        y - The y-coordinate of the text
        font - Font name请参考编程手册
        rotation - The rotation angle of text
        0 : No rotation
        90 : degrees, in clockwise direction
        180 : degrees, in clockwise direction
        270 : degrees, in clockwise direction
        x_multiplication - Horizontal multiplication, up to 10x
        y_multiplication - Vertical multiplication, up to 10x
        content - Content of text string
        返回:
        byte[]

      • block

        public static byte[] block(int x,
           int y,
           int width,
           int height,
           java.lang.String font,
           int rotation,
           int x_multiplication,
           int y_multiplication,
           int space,
           int alignment,
           java.lang.String content)
        This command prints paragraph on label.
        BLOCK x,y,width,height,”font”,rotation,x-multiplication,y-multiplication,[space,]alignment,]“content”
        参数:
        x - The x-coordinate of the text
        y - The y-coordinate of the text
        width - The width of block for the paragraph in dots
        height - The height of block for the paragraph in dots
        font - Font name
        rotation - The rotation angle of text
        0 : No rotation
        90 : degrees, in clockwise direction
        180 : degrees, in clockwise direction
        270 : degrees, in clockwise direction
        x_multiplication - Horizontal multiplication, up to 10x
        y_multiplication - Vertical multiplication, up to 10x
        space - Add or delete the space between lines in dot.
        alignment - Text alignment. 0 : default (Left);1 : Left;2 : Center; 3 : Right
        content - Data in block. The maximum data length is 4092 bytes.
        返回:
        byte[]

      • block

        public static byte[] block(int x,
           int y,
           int width,
           int height,

        270 : degrees, in clockwise direction

        y_multiplication - Vertical multiplication, up to 10x
        space - Add or delete the space between lines in dot.
        alignment - Text alignment. 0 : default (Left);1 : Left;2 : Center; 3 : Right
        content - Data in block. The maximum data length is 4092 bytes.

      • checkPrinterStateByPort9100

        public static byte[] checkPrinterStateByPort9100()
        This command obtains the printer status at any time, even in the event of printer error. An inquiry
        request is solicited by sending an (ASCII 27, escape character) as the beginning control character
        to the printer. A one byte character is returned, flagging the printer status. A 0 signifies the printer is
        ready to print labels.
        < ESC >!?
        此指令使用于9100端口，发一次，每当打印机状态改变，就有数据返回

      • checkPrinterStateByPort4000

        public static byte[] checkPrinterStateByPort4000()
        此指令使用于4000端口，发一次，打印机返回一次代表状态的数据
        返回:
        byte[]

        Download 程序文档

        filename - FILENAME The name of data file that will remain resident in the printer memory

      • eop

        public static byte[] eop()
        End of program. To declare the start and end of BASIC language commands used in a program, DOWNLOAD “FILENAME.BAS “ must be added in the first line of the program, and “EOP “ statement at the last line of program.
        EOP
        返回:
        byte[]

      • files

        public static byte[] files()
        This command prints out the total memory size, available memory size and files lists (or lists the files through RS-232) in the printer memory (both FLASH memory and DRAM).
        FILES
        返回:
        byte[]

      • kill

        public static byte[] kill(java.lang.String filename)
        This command deletes a file in the printer memory. The wild card (*) will delete all files resident in specified DRAM or FLASH memory.
        KILL ”FILENAME”
        参数:
        filename - The name of data file that will delete in the printer memory (case sensitive)
        返回:
        byte[]

      • move

        public static byte[] move()
        This command moves downloaded files from DRAM to FLASH memory.
        MOVE
        返回:
        byte[]

      • run

        public static byte[] run(java.lang.String filename)
        This command executes a program resident in the printer memory. It is available for TSPL2 language printers only.
        RUN “FILENAME.BAS”
        This command can be replaced to filename that without typing “.BAS”.
        参数:
        filename - 打印机内存中的文件名称
        返回:
        byte[]
